summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 24, 25 and 26 in Block 1, Lots 1, 2, 3, 24, 25 and 26 in Blocks 2 to 4 inclusive, and Lots 1, 2, 3, 25 and 26 in Block 5, all in Loyal View Addition; Lots 1, 2, 3, 30, 31 and 32 in Blocks 1 and 2, Loyal Heights Division No. 4; Lots 1, 2, 5, 6 and 7 in Block 1, Loyal Home Addition; and Lots 1, 2, 3, 29, 30 and 31 in Block 2, Loyal Home Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-215 and 17-161, respectively.
